Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Coil Closed
Parameter.Whatis: Is the coil closed. If it is then then the case will be computed in two parts.

Parameter.Name: Desired Coil Current
Parameter.Whatis: The desired coil current J0 in the coil. The default is 1.

Parameter.Name: Desired Current Density
Parameter.Whatis: The desired coil current density j0 in the coil. The default is 1.

Parameter.Name: Coil Cross Section
Parameter.Whatis: Cross section (area) of the coil that may be used to related total current and current density.

Parameter.Name: Normalize Coil Current
Parameter.Whatis: After the current has been computed normalize it to the desired magnitude if this flag is given.

Parameter.Name: Coil Normal (3-vector)
Parameter.Whatis: Normal vector of the coild. If not given axis of maximum inertia of the coil.

Parameter.Name: Coil Center (3-vector)
Parameter.Whatis: Center of the coil. If not given center of volume of the coil.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Elemental Fields
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate elemental fields using Discontinuous Galerkin basis.

Parameter.Name: Narrow Interface
Parameter.Whatis: For closed coil use narrow strategy to set the one/zero BCs.

Parameter.Name: Coil Conductivity Fix
Parameter.Whatis: Fix the coil conductivity so that the current density would be more even.

Parameter.Name: Coil Anisotropic
Parameter.Whatis: Make the conductivity be aligned with the gradient of the potential.

Parameter.Name: Use Wall Distance
Parameter.Whatis: Use wall distance to introduce anisotropy into the coil conductivity.

Parameter.Name: Cfix diffusion
Parameter.Whatis: Diffusion coefficient for regularization of c field.

Parameter.Name: Coil Start
Parameter.Whatis: Defines a boundary where coil starts. Not needed if coil is closed.

Parameter.Name: Coil End
Parameter.Whatis: Defines a boundary where coil ends. Not needed if coil is closed.
